Course_Name: From Augustus to Mussolini: Urbanism in 20th Century Rome at the Dawn of Fascism - Seminar SoSe 2024

Messages.Author: Gabriele Böhm
Messages.Content: Liebe Studierende, die Anmeldung für die Modulprüfung für das Modul Baugeschichte - Architektur als Ausdruck politischer Tendenzen I: From Augustus to Mussolini: Urbanism in 20th Century Rome at the Dawn of Fascism ist ab sofort in MOSES möglich.  Modulnummer: 61339 (Bachelor) Modulnummer: 61414 (Master)  Mit freundlichen Grüßen  Gabriele Böhm Sekretariat A 22 Bau- und Stadtbaugeschichte

Messages.Author: Gabriele Böhm
Messages.Content: Liebe Studierende,  die Prüfungsanmeldung ist in MOSES eröffnet, bitte melden Sie sich an.  Mit freundlichen Grüßen  Gabriele Böhm Sekretariat Bau- und Stadtbaugeschichte

Messages.Author: Ursula Quatember
Messages.Content: Dear participants in the seminar "From Augustus to Mussolini", Your course is now open for evaluation until July 14, 2024. I'll be very happy to get some constructive feedback. Attached you will find the link, which will also be posted on ISIS. An English version of the survey is available. https://befragung.tu-berlin.de/evasys/online.php?p=AZHK7 Thanks a lot in advance for your participation. Best wishes, Ursula Quatember

Messages.Author: Ursula Quatember
Messages.Content: Dear participants in the seminar "From Augustus to Mussolini", I have uploaded the new schedule on ISIS, and I am also sending them here attached. Please check the dates for your presentations!  Things have shifted slightly from the version I showed you this morning, so please make sure you can hold your presentations on the day they are scheduled. If there is any problem, please let me know. Best wishes, Ursula Quatember

Messages.Author: Ursula Quatember
Messages.Content: Dear participants in the Seminar "From Augustus to Mussolini", We will proceed with our presentations on Tuesday, June 11 in chronological order. i.e., I would kindly ask the students scheduled for last week, June 4, to give their talks (plus, if possible, the presentation on the Forum of Cesar). Please try to stick to the time frame. We will also talk about the new schedule for the rest of the semester. Best wishes, Ursula Quatember

Messages.Author: Ursula Quatember
Messages.Content: Dear students, Unfortunately I have gotten sick and have to cancel our class on Tuesday, June 4, 2024. Best wishes, Ursula Quatember
